title: Kimbula Ele Guna’s associated nabbed
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A close associate of Big-Time Drug Trafficker Kimbula Ele Guna was arrested by the Police Special Task Force in Bloemendhal, Colombo.
The STF also seized 13 grams of heroin, 01 gram of ice, 22 grams of Kerala cannabis and 160 drugs in the suspect’s possession.
